ing.item: Fresh ginger root, cut into tiny matchstick pieces

directions.step:
Cut off the tough stems of the asparagus. If you wish, peel the stems partway up with a vegetable peeler.
Cut the asparagus into pieces about 1/2 inch thick, on a sharp diagonal.
Heat the oil in a skillet. Add the ginger and cook for a few seconds until fragrant.
Add the asparagus, sprinkle with the salt and toss with the oil. Cook for 1 to 2 minutes. Add the sugar, toss, cover and cook for 2 to 3 minutes.
Add the lemon juice. Toss well and serve. Yield: 4 to 6 servings. Typed in MMFormat by cjhartlin@msn.com Source: Cooking with Bonnie Stern. Posted to MM-Recipes Digest by "Cindy Hartlin" <cjhartlin@email.msn.com> on May 29, 1998
